The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going into their stomachs and into their brains. They group tries to make their way back to safety only to run into kidnappers looking to vivisect the missing crew.
